summary: "Macbeth," a play by William Shakespeare, tells the story of a Scottish general who becomes king after hearing a prophecy from witches and being encouraged by his wife. Consumed by ambition, Macbeth murders King Duncan. However, he is overcome by guilt and paranoia, leading to more murders and a descent into madness. Based on a historical account, the play is considered cursed by some in the theater world and is often called "The Scottish Play." It has been performed by famous actors and adapted for various media.
title: Macbeth
